newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: CRICKET-INDIA WIN TOSS, TO FIELD IN SECOND TEST.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-INDIA WIN TOSS, TO FIELD IN SECOND TEST.

text.p: India won the toss and sent Sri Lanka in to bat on the first day of the second and final test match in Colombo on Saturday.

TEAMS: Sri Lanka: Arjuan Ranatunga (captain), Sanath Jayasuriya, Marvan Atapattu, Aravinda de Silva, Roshan Mahanama, Mahela Jayawardena, Romesh Kaluwitharana, Chamida Vaas, Ravindra Pushpakumara, Sajeeva de Silva, Muthiah Muralitharan
India: Sachin Tendulkar, Saurav Ganguly, Navjot Sidhu, Rahul Dravid, Mohammed Azharuddin, Ajay Jadeja, Nayan Mongia, Anil Kumble, Abey Kuruvilla, Venkatesh Prasad, Debasis Mohanty.
